mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, user_name AS userName, pass_word AS passWord, telephone AS telephone, e_mail AS eMail, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM user_tbl WHERE data_state = '1' AND user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tbl (user_name, pass_word, e_mail, telephone) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{eMail}, #{telephone})
